snippet: J.J. Hardy hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the seventh inning, and the Baltimore Orioles gave away a six-run lead before rebounding to beat the Cincinnati Reds 9-7 Thursday night for a three-game sweep....

headline.print_headline: Orioles Beat Reds 9-7 to Complete 3-Game Sweep
headline.main: Orioles Beat Reds 9-7 to Complete 3-Game Sweep

lead_paragraph: J.J. Hardy hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the seventh inning, and the Baltimore Orioles gave away a six-run lead before rebounding to beat the Cincinnati Reds 9-7 Thursday night for a three-game sweep.
